summary: This is an email chain discussing a fresh court battle that could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein. It mentions coordination with legal figures and references a Politico article on the topic.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Sends regards to Judge Cassell, noting he was note editor when Cassell was president of the law review.

persons.name: Cassell
persons.context: Referred to as Judge Cassell; former president of a law review; the legal team has a call scheduled with him.

persons.name: BJay Pak
persons.context: Had a call with the team where they gave him a high-level overview of their investigation; his team will follow up as necessary.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line regarding his controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the plea deal controversy referenced in the email subject and linked article.

connections.description: Geoff knew Cassell from law school when Cassell was president of the law review and Geoff was note editor.
Both are legal officials involved in discussions regarding the investigation into the Epstein plea deal.
Acosta was involved in a controversial plea deal with Epstein, which is the subject of the court battle.

events.title: Email correspondence about Epstein plea deal
events.description: Email exchange discussing a fresh court battle that could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial Epstein plea deal.

events.title: Politico article on Acosta-Epstein deal
events.description: Politico publishes an article titled 'Fresh court battle could expose more details in Acosta's controversial Epstein plea deal'.

events.title: Scheduled call with Judge Cassell
events.description: The legal team has a call scheduled with Judge Cassell regarding the investigation.

keyFacts: A fresh court battle could expose more details about Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein.
The email references coordination among legal officials, including a call with Judge Cassell and a prior call with BJay Pak.
Geoff, a correspondent, has a prior professional connection with Judge Cassell from law school.
The communication is based on a Politico article published on March 6, 2019, highlighting ongoing legal and media scrutiny of the Epstein case.
